name: Foster Care
description: National Center for Youth Law (NCYL) works to ensure children and youth in foster care benefit from a positive and stable home-like environment. We dismantle practices that harm children in foster care, ensure youth in foster care have access to health care and education, and promote youth-, community-, and family-centered policies that preserve families and reduce reliance on the foster care system. NCYL Initiatives: - Preserve families and reduce entries into foster care - Ensure youth in fost
